alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued May 24 at 2:40AM MDT until May 25 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin and Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could affect sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin
